body:
## Expected Behavior
Works

## Actual Behavior
`Method temporal.api.workflowservice.v1.WorkflowService/DescribeWorkflowExecution is unimplemented.`

## Steps to Reproduce the Problem
I reproduced this using the out-of-proc test service (https://github.com/temporalio/sdk-java/pull/470/files) which simply exposes the GRPC, but I'm guessing you'd rather reproduce this in process by writing a test.


## Specifications

  - Version:
  - Platform:

comments.body: I'd be happy to help contribute if somebody could fast-forward me by telling me some of the places I need to edit and where I should put the test (and perhaps similar tests to pattern-match off of.)

title: DescribeWorkflowExecution is not implemented for the java test service.
